name: Norman Zvenyika
bio:
I'm studying Computer Science and Bioengineering at Lehigh University, where my passion for machine learning, data engineering, and software engineering continues to grow. I thrive when unraveling complex problems and delving into the fascinating crossovers between technology, biology, and society.

My journey so far has been diverse - I've gained enriching experience as a software engineering intern, honed my pedagogical skills as a teaching assistant, and embraced leadership roles to spearhead social impact projects and health advancements.

I am motivated by the belief that the right use of technology can significantly benefit society. Thus, I'm always keen to discover new opportunities to channel my skills for the greater good.

I would love to connect with those interested in exchanging ideas, exploring collaborations, or simply discussing the transformative potential of technology!
